name.ja: チョッピー・オーク【アンブロック済】

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Play Choppy Orc [Unblocked] as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.el: Juega a Choppy Orc [Desbloqueado] como una extensión de Chrome - Además, ¡puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.es: Juega a Choppy Orc [Desbloqueado] como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi Choppy Orc [Blokeerimata] Chrome'i laiendina – saad mängida ka ilma internetiühenduseta, proovi kohe!
short.fi: Pelaa Shake Orcia [Estämättömänä] Chromen laajennuksena - Voit myös pelata ilman internetyhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Choppy Orc [Walang Blocked] bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin itong laruin nang walang Internet, subukan mo na…
short.he: שחק אורק מנופץ [נחסם] כתוסף Chrome - גם אפשר לשחק בלי חיבור לאינטרנט, נסה כעת!
short.it: Gioca a Choppy Orc [Sbloccato] come estensione per Chrome - Puoi anche giocare senza internet, prova ora!
short.ja: 「Play Choppy Orc [Unblocked]」をChrome拡張機能としてプレイできます。インターネット接続なしでプレイすることも可能です。いますぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: Chrome 확장 프로그램으로 차단 해제된 Choppy Orc를 플레이해 보세요. 인터넷 연결없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 바로 시도해보세요!
short.ms: Juega a Choppy Orc [Desbloqueado] como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.nl: Speel Choppy Orc [Unblocked] als een Chrome-extensie - Kan ook worden gespeeld zonder internet, probeer het nu!
short.no: Juega Choppy Orc [Desbloqueado] como una extensión de Chrome - ¡También se puede jugar sin Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.ro: Joacă Choppy Orc [Deblocat] ca extensie Chrome - De asemenea, poți juca fără conexiune la internet, încearcă acum!
short.sl: Igrajte igro Choppy Orc [Ne blokirano] kot razširitev Chrome - Lahko igrate tudi brez internetne povezave, preizkusite zdaj!
short.sr: Играйте Choppy Orc [Неблокирано] као Chrome продужење - Такође можеће играти без интенета, покушајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Choppy Orc [Olåst] som en Chrome-tillägg - Kan också spelas utan internet, prova nu!
short.th: เล่น Choppy Orc [Unblocked] เป็นส่วนเสริมของ Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.vi: Chơi Choppy Orc [Unblocked] như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为Chrome扩展程序玩“Choppy Orc [Unblocked]” - 也可以无需联网进行游戏，立即尝试吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the exciting world of Choppy Orc Unblocked! 🌟 Embark on a thrilling puzzle-platformer adventure where strategy, timing, and problem-solving skills are your keys to success. 🧩🏞️ Take on the role of a clever orc navigating through challenging levels filled with obstacles and surprises.

Your mission? Reach the portal at the end of each level by strategically using magical boxes, trampolines, and other objects scattered throughout the environment. 📦🎉 Each level poses a unique puzzle, demanding careful planning and precise execution to conquer.

Game Controls:
👉 Arrow Keys or WASD: Move the orc left or right.
🚀 Space Bar: Interact with objects, pick up and place boxes, or make the orc jump.
🖱️ Mouse Click: In some levels, use the mouse to interact with specific objects or parts of the environment.

Get ready for a magical journey full of challenges and fun in Choppy Orc Unblocked! 🌈🎮 Are you up for the challenge?

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
